product_name: Pearl Izumi Infinity Windblocking Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Infinity Windblocking jacket takes the edge off your cold-weather training thanks to a wind-resistant exterior and fleece interior for extra warmth. Front panels shed wind and light rain thanks to polyurethane-reinforced soft-shell fabric; rear panels feature stretch fabric for enhanced mobility. Fleeced polyester fabric on back and arm panels offers light insulation, wicks moisture away from body and dries quickly. Full-length zipper offers instant ventilation and easy on-and-off; mitted cuffs extend over hands to keep fingers warm. 2 zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered rear pocket offer storage; reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The semifitted Infinity Windblocking jacket from Pearl Izumi skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
